parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve.  If the query value is higher than the number of pages, the last page is returned.  If not provided or less than 1, the first page is returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.  Will be capped at a server-set maximum value if higher

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The order by clause to sort the results by; either 'ASC' or 'DESC'. If not provided, no sort is set.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The where clause to filter the results by.  For each field listed, an AND operation is performed for equality against the values provided.  If no where clause is provided, all results are fetched.

The OpenAPI specification of the Arion API as an @nestjs/swagger OpenAPIObject

itemsPerPage.description: The metadata describing the position and size of the paginated data versus the full pagination set

totalItems.description: The total number of items in the paginated data set

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the paginated data set

orderBy.description: The order by clause for the paginated data set

where.description: The where clause for the paginated data set

first.description: The link to the first page

previous.description: The link to the previous page

current.description: The link to the current page

next.description: The link to the next page

last.description: The link to the last page

data.description: The paginated data set of generic type T

links.description: The links to the first, previous, current, next, and last pages

id.description: The unique identifier of the simulation configuration

simSet.description: The simulation set to which this simulation configuration belongs

simSetId.description: The unique identifier of the simulation set to generate a SimConfig for

orgConfig.description: The organizational configuration for this simulation configuration

orgConfigId.description: The unique identifier of the OrgConfig to generate the simulation config for

runCount.description: The number of runs executed for the simulation configuration

days.description: The number of simulation 'days' to run the simulation for.

randomStreamType.description: The type of random stream to use for the simulation. 'static' uses a deterministic sequence from fixed random seeds and is useful for testing, 'random' uses Math.random().

start.description: The start date and time of the simulation

end.description: The end date and time of the simulation

durationSec.description: The duration of the simulation in seconds

avgPerformance.description: The average performance across all results of the SimConfig

stdDevPerformance.description: The standard deviation of performance across all results of the SimConfig

entropy.description: The entropy of the results of the simulation

clockTick.description: The clock tick for which the state space point is recorded

agentStates.description: The state of the Agent Set

reporting.description: The state of the Reporting System

priorityTensor.description: The priority tensor at this clock tick

id.description: The unique identifier of the ConfiguratorParamsDTO

modelName.description: The signature name of the Model to use for generating the OrgConfigs

configuratorName.description: The signature name of the Configurator to use for generating the OrgConfigs

data.description: The data object containing the parameters for the model Configurator

hash.description: Unique hash used for indexing and quick search of the ConfiguratorParamsDTO data
